short_summary: Request for Proposal. The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
description: Narda SRM-3006, Selective Radiation Meter NO DE PIECE: 3006/101 or equivalent NSN: (6625) 20-A0W4472 COF/FABRICANT: 99899. Quantity: 2, Unit of Issue: KT, to be delivered to 45 Sacr\u00e9-Coeur Blvd, Gatineau, QC J8X 1C6.
